#summary How to setup maven dependencies

= Introduction =

This page describes maven configuration required to get dependecies


= Details =

  * Setup maven repositories to your pom.xml or M2_HOME/config/settings.xml or M2_REPO/.m2/settings.xml
{{{
    <repositories>
        <repository>
            <id>sqlsheet.googlecode.com</id>
            <name>sqlsheet.googlecode.com</name>
            <releases>
                <enabled>true</enabled>
                <checksumPolicy>ignore</checksumPolicy>
            </releases>
            <snapshots>
                <enabled>true</enabled>
            </snapshots>
            <url>https://sqlsheet.googlecode.com/svn/maven2</url>
        </repository>
    </repositories>
}}}

  * Add required dependencies
{{{
      <dependency>
          <groupId>com.google.code</groupId>
          <artifactId>sqlsheet</artifactId>
          <version>6</version>
      </dependency>
}}}
